text: I enjoyed my visit. I ordered the boneless chicken wings(garlic&parm). It was delicious. The staff was kind and prompt. I wouldve only preferred my chicken be better tossed in the sauce.

name: Heather Walton
text: Saturday night, and the restaurant is obviously swamped. An item was forgotten (not the end of the world) but Cody showed back up later with it. He had such a great personality!  Things happen..but he showed EXCELLENT customer service. Also great pizza, thanks, guys!

name: B Hu
text: Better pizza than Papa John's, fresher ingredients. Prices about the same. Not as many "specials" though, wish there were more. Delivery is fast and always with a smile. Sometimes I have to good pizza another 2-3 minutes so it isn't so soggy on the bottom but the ingredients are better so I don't mind.

text: This place is really close to our home. Always fast, don't remember this place ever messing up our order. Always friendly staff.

name: Kitty Houston
text: Nope...nope...nope...Pizza Hut is not what it used to be!! My pizza looked like they ran out of cheese and toppings half way through! And the crust was supposed to be pan but it was doughy and not crispy and buttery at all! I honestly like Little Caesars way better. I will never go back Pizza Hut‚ÄîI‚Äôm done this time.

name: Jazz Wright
text: If you wait for your pizza, right out of the oven it will be good. However, i walked in, 4 employees made eye contact, but failed to acknowledge, finally a driver came in and saw how busy everything was, jumped in, took my order, and was personable and cool. That employee (no name tag) saved the day, so i will definitely go back.
